Package mud

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Character
    An abstract class that represents a character in the game's model.
    Command
    Command is basically a glorified tuple holding an Action and a String.
    Door
    A Door points to a Room.
    Game
    Represents the game.
    GameObject
    GameObject is the root object for all model objects in the MUD.
    Item
    An inert object in the MUD.
    Mob
    A Mob, short for mobile entity, is a Character not controlled by a human, aka an NPC.
    Parser
    A class for parsing Command objects from user input.
    Player
    A Player is a human controlled Character within the MUD.
    Room
    A discrete place within the MUD's model.
    UserInterface
    Handles input from the end user, and routes it to a Game object.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Action
    Action is an enum that represents the concrete actions that the MUD supports.
    Direction
    The directional inputs that the MUD understands.
    Items
    An enum for mass-producing item objects.
